text: Two nights in a row, $20 tip from random dudes I've never seen before.  I'm tired and I've got a cold, so I think it must be my new haircut.
I think I just scared off three Metrosexual kids, and I have no idea what I did.  I was  nice, I asked for their ID's, they were all 21+...
You know it's a party when the guitar player punches the drummer in the face #goddamngutterskunks
Best bar quote of recent times:  "FOUR kids?  That's not going to happen to me. I take my birth control like it's my job." #waytruefacts
